name: blender
description: The blender for the Westpac Design System
author: Westpac GEL Team <gel@westpac.com.au>

scripts.build:lib: npx mkdirp lib && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:bin: npx mkdirp bin && mv lib/bin.js bin/index.js
scripts.test: yarn test:format && yarn test:lint && yarn test:unit
scripts.deploy:staging:msg:
echo "If you made changes to the nginx config follow below steps:

1. Log into the server: \x1b[33mssh deploy@165.22.110.244\x1b[0m
2. Copy the file: \x1b[33msudo cp /srv/blender/server/nginx/blender-routes.conf /etc/nginx/snippets/blender-routes.conf\x1b[0m
3. Test the new config: \x1b[33msudo nginx -t\x1b[0m
4. If there are errors correct them in this repo and start again from scratch by running \x1b[33myarn deploy:staging\x1b[0m
5. If all is well run \x1b[33msudo nginx -s reload\x1b[0m
6. ✨ Done
"
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn deploy:staging:sync && yarn deploy:staging:yarn:root && yarn deploy:staging:yarn:server && yarn deploy:staging:build && yarn deploy:staging:restart && yarn deploy:staging:msg
scripts.deploy:live:msg:
echo "If you made changes to the nginx config follow below steps:

1. Log into the server: \x1b[33mssh deploy@128.199.200.220\x1b[0m
2. Copy the file: \x1b[33msudo cp /srv/blender/server/nginx/blender-routes.conf /etc/nginx/snippets/blender-routes.conf\x1b[0m
3. Test the new config: \x1b[33msudo nginx -t\x1b[0m
4. If there are errors correct them in this repo and start again from scratch by running \x1b[33myarn deploy:live\x1b[0m
5. If all is well run \x1b[33msudo nginx -s reload\x1b[0m
6. ✨ Done
"
scripts.deploy:live: yarn deploy:live:sync && yarn deploy:live:yarn:root && yarn deploy:live:yarn:server && yarn deploy:live:build && yarn deploy:live:restart && yarn deploy:live:msg
scripts.nuke: rm -rf lib && rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock
